name: Teagan Quest
description:
A fun game about my good friend Teagan that I made in two days.


This game is ment to be a joke, that is apparent just by the overall quality of it. This is my first ever game and it was ment to help me learn how to use RenPy and other things like that. Fun learning experience for me yay! If you like the game good on you! If you don't like it then that's fine because the game was made for my friends and I'm just publishing it here because I think it would be silly!
